backgroundInformationList.description: Notice of Passing of By-laws 239-2021 and 240-2021 - 165 Stanley Avenue

noticeDescription: Take notice that the Council of the City of Toronto has passed By-laws 239-2021 and 240-2021 to designate 165 Stanley Avenue (Etobicoke-Lakeshore, Ward 3) as being of cultural heritage value or interest.

otherReferenceList.description: 2020.PB18.3 - Intention to Designate under Part IV, Section 29 of the Ontario Heritage Act and Authority to Enter Into a Heritage Easement Agreement - 165 Stanley Avenue
2020.EY19.4 - Intention to Designate under Part IV, Section 29 of the Ontario Heritage Act and Authority to Enter Into a Heritage Easement Agreement - 165 Stanley Avenue
By-law 239-2021 - To designate the property at 165 Stanley Avenue as being of cultural heritage value or interest
By-law 240-2021 - To provide for the entering into of a heritage easement agreement for the conservation of the property known municipally as 165 Stanley Avenue

subheading: In the Matter of the Ontario Heritage Act R.S.O. 1990 Chapter 0.18 and 165 Stanley Avenue, City of Toronto, Province of Ontario
title: Notice of Passing of By-laws 239-2021 and 240-2021 - 165 Stanley Avenue
topics: Heritage > Designation of a heritage property
